Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Damen, 55th, Western and 59th, due to street blockage near 59th/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Damen, 55th, Western and 59th, due to street blockage near 59th/Hoyne.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Damen
ShortDescription: EB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Damen, 67th, Ashland and 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Damen, 67th, Ashland and 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Damen.
